segments.text: I notice the woman facing the sink, holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's using a towel to dry it carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running, and the basin is full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spills over the edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinets are open with a cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy stands on a stool reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems unsteady, leaning back a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate in his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby has her arm up toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks like she's asking for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink shows a neat garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight comes in, lighting the room softly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an everyday kitchen moment with some hidden risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone will notice soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
